class_notes:
Cross-listed with NBB_OX 304W


In addition to the lecture, you will need to enroll in one of the two lab sections, either NBB_OX 304L or PSYC_OX 304L, that will be offered W or Th, 2:30-5:15. Students can enroll in any combination of lecture and lab (ex., a student can take PSYC_OX 304W lecture with NBB_OX 304L).
course_description: A course focused on the relationships between hormones, brain function and behavior, as well as the techniques used to investigate them.
prerequisites: PSYC 110 or PSYC_OX 110 or BIOL 141 or BIOL_OX 141 or  NBB_OX 202 or PSYC_OX 202 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4539, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: R. Thompson, Status: Open
